title: Valve Declines Half-Life 2 Remake - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.22.19
description:
Get your first refill pack free at http://getquip.com/games

Get 15% off your first order at http://thirdlove.com/games

Andrea joins Gary for Whitta Wednesday to discuss the NPD numbers for April, Ouya’s final death rattle, Valve’s decision to turn down a remake of Half-Life 2, and new details about Mario Kart Tour.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:45 - Housekeeping
Greg and Tim are in Florida this week for Full Sail Hall of Fame! See them at their on-campus Meet and Greet Wednesday at 1 PM in the Building 3 EB Lobby. Then, catch them at their open-to-the-public meet and greet Wednesday! Details on Greg’s Twitter soon.
Andrea will be in London this weekend at the What’s Good Games Meet Up on Sunday May 26th at the Marquis of Westminster from 3-6pm - see more details on her Twitter @andrearene or at Facebook.com/whatsgoodgames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack, Tom Bock, and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:07:15 - MORTAL KOMBAT 11 AND DAYS GONE ARE THE BEST-SELLING GAMES OF APRIL 2019 - via IGN
00:24:10 - Ouya's game store closes for good next month - via Eurogamer - Tom Philips
00:30:18 - WORLD WAR Z STUDIO WANTED TO DO A REMAKE OF HALF-LIFE 2 - via IGN, Adam Bankhurst
00:42:48 - Mario Kart Tour’ Beta Locks Powerful ‘Rare’ Characters Behind Paywall - via Liz Lanier - Variety Gaming
00:49:17 - Require Reading! - Video games: A unifying force for the world
https://blogs.microsoft.com/blog/2019/05/20/video-games-a-unifying-force-for-the-world/
00:50:50 -  Quip
00:52:25 - Third Love
00:53:46 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:54:40 - So I ran across this article claiming THQ Nordic has close to 50 unannounced games in their development pipeline, and just at 80 games in development. Do you guys think this developmental shotgun approach could be successful for THQ Nordic in a critical sense, or that simply these games are destined to be mid-tier/smaller scale games?- DJBradChill
01:02:10 - Squad Up: Elliott(Xbox one) - Rellseli66
01:02:45 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Fran and Andrea
